nodes.title: Realtime Speech To Text
nodes.description:
Realtime speech-to-text transcription using ElevenLabs WebSocket API.
    
    Streams audio chunks in and receives transcription results in real-time.
    Supports both manual commit and voice activity detection (VAD) modes.
    
    Use this node with:
    - model_id: The transcription model to use
    - audio_format: Input audio format (PCM16 recommended)
    - commit_strategy: "manual" or "vad" (voice activity detection)
    - include_timestamps: Get word-level timing information
    - include_language_detection: Detect the spoken language

properties.name: chunk
properties.title: Chunk
properties.description: Audio chunk input stream. Expects base64-encoded audio data with metadata.

properties.name: model_id
properties.title: Model Id
properties.description: Model ID to use for transcription.

properties.name: language_code
properties.title: Language Code
properties.description: Language code (ISO 639-1 or ISO 639-3). Leave empty for auto-detection.

properties.name: commit_strategy
properties.title: Commit Strategy
properties.description: Strategy for committing transcriptions: manual or voice activity detection (VAD).

properties.name: include_timestamps
properties.title: Include Timestamps
properties.description: Include word-level timestamps in the transcription.

properties.name: include_language_detection
properties.title: Include Language Detection
properties.description: Include language detection in the transcription.

properties.name: vad_silence_threshold_secs
properties.title: Vad Silence Threshold Secs
properties.description: Silence threshold in seconds for VAD mode.

properties.name: vad_threshold
properties.title: Vad Threshold
properties.description: Threshold for voice activity detection.

properties.name: min_speech_duration_ms
properties.title: Min Speech Duration Ms
properties.description: Minimum speech duration in milliseconds.

properties.name: min_silence_duration_ms
properties.title: Min Silence Duration Ms
properties.description: Minimum silence duration in milliseconds.

nodes.title: Realtime Text To Speech
nodes.description:
Stream text-to-speech using ElevenLabs WebSocket API. Consumes text chunks and outputs audio chunks in real-time.
    audio, tts, speech, streaming, realtime, websocket

    Use cases:
    - Real-time voice generation from streaming text
    - Interactive voice applications
    - Low-latency text-to-speech conversion
    - Streaming dialogue generation

properties.name: voice
properties.title: Voice
properties.description: Voice ID to be used for generation

properties.name: chunk
properties.title: Chunk
properties.description: The text chunk to use as input.

properties.name: model_id
properties.title: Model Id
properties.description: The TTS model to use for generation

properties.name: language_code
properties.title: Language Code
properties.description: Language code to enforce (only works with Turbo v2.5)

properties.name: output_format
properties.title: Output Format
properties.description: Audio output format for streaming

properties.name: stability
properties.title: Stability
properties.description: Voice stability (0-1). Higher values make output more consistent

properties.name: similarity_boost
properties.title: Similarity Boost
properties.description: Similarity to original voice (0-1)

properties.name: style
properties.title: Style
properties.description: Speaking style emphasis (0-1)

properties.name: use_speaker_boost
properties.title: Use Speaker Boost
properties.description: Whether to use speaker boost for clearer output

properties.name: speed
properties.title: Speed
properties.description: Speed of the generated speech (0.7-1.2)

properties.name: enable_ssml_parsing
properties.title: Enable Ssml Parsing
properties.description: Enable SSML parsing in text input

nodes.title: Text To Speech
nodes.description:
Generate natural-sounding speech using ElevenLabs' advanced text-to-speech technology. Features multiple voices and customizable parameters.
    audio, tts, speech, synthesis, voice

    Use cases:
    - Create professional voiceovers
    - Generate character voices
    - Produce multilingual content
    - Create audiobooks
    - Generate voice content

properties.name: voice
properties.title: Voice
properties.description: Voice ID to be used for generation

properties.name: text
properties.title: Text
properties.description: The text to convert to speech

properties.name: tts_model_id
properties.title: Tts Model Id
properties.description: The TTS model to use for generation

properties.name: voice_settings
properties.title: Voice Settings
properties.description: Optional voice settings to override defaults

properties.name: language_code
properties.title: Language Code
properties.description: Language code to enforce (only works with Turbo v2.5)

properties.name: optimize_streaming_latency
properties.title: Optimize Streaming Latency
properties.description: Latency optimization level (0-4). Higher values trade quality for speed

properties.name: seed
properties.title: Seed
properties.description: Seed for deterministic generation (0-4294967295). -1 means random

properties.name: text_normalization
properties.title: Text Normalization
properties.description: Controls text normalization behavior

properties.name: stability
properties.title: Stability
properties.description: Voice stability (0-1). Higher values make output more consistent, lower values more varied

properties.name: similarity_boost
properties.title: Similarity Boost
properties.description: Similarity to original voice (0-1). Higher values make output closer to original voice

properties.name: style
properties.title: Style
properties.description: Speaking style emphasis (0-1). Higher values increase style expression

properties.name: use_speaker_boost
properties.title: Use Speaker Boost
properties.description: Whether to use speaker boost for clearer, more consistent output
